knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
library(anytime)
library(epigrowthfit)
df <- read.csv("COVID19_cases.csv")
freq <- df %>%
  group_by(Date) %>%
  summarize(n=n())
freq$Date <- anytime::anydate(freq$Date )
init1 <- egf_init(date = freq$Date, cases = freq$n, last = anytime::anydate("2020-05-01"))
fit1 <- egf(init1)
plot(fit1)
init2 <- egf_init(date = freq$Date, cases = freq$n, first = anytime::anydate("2020-08-15"))
fit2 <- egf(init2)
plot(fit2)
```
